Counter_CMDName.label: Name
Counter_CMDName.tooltip: The command that list counters or can modify them

Counter_CMDIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
Counter_CMDIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

Counter_CMDDescription.label: Description
Counter_CMDDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

Counter_String_CounterJoin.label: Limiter
Counter_String_CounterJoin.tooltip: The string to use for separating counters

Counter_CMDModifyPermissions.label: Permission needed for modification
Counter_CMDModifyPermissions.tooltip: Only users with this permission can add or delete counters

Counter_String_AvailableCounters.label: Available counters string (available tags: $list)
Counter_String_AvailableCounters.tooltip: The text shown when listing counters

Counter_String_AddedCounter.label: Added counter response (available tags: $counter)
Counter_String_AddedCounter.tooltip: The text sent when a counter is added

Counter_String_DeletedCounter.label: Deleted counter response (available tags: $counter)
Counter_String_DeletedCounter.tooltip: The text sent when a counter is deleted

Counter_String_Help.label: Help text (available tags: $counter, $cooldown)
Counter_String_Help.tooltip: The text shown when fetching help for a counter

Counter_String_WholeNumber.value: You have to provide a whole number
Counter_String_WholeNumber.label: Non-whole number response
Counter_String_WholeNumber.tooltip: The text shown when providing a non-whole number for a counter

Counter_String_AlreadyExists.label: Counter already exists response
Counter_String_AlreadyExists.tooltip: The text shown when a counter already exists

Counter_String_CommandExists.value: There is already a command with this name
Counter_String_CommandExists.label: Command exists response
Counter_String_CommandExists.tooltip: The text shown when a command with the given counter name exists

Counter_String_NonASCII.value: The counter name may only contain ascii-letters from a-z
Counter_String_NonASCII.label: Invalid character response
Counter_String_NonASCII.tooltip: The text shown when a counter name does contain invalid characters

Counter_String_ConfirmNeeded.value: You have to confirm the deletion
Counter_String_ConfirmNeeded.label: Confirmation needed response
Counter_String_ConfirmNeeded.tooltip: The text shown when a confirmation for deletion is missing

Counter_String_DefaultFormat.label: Default counter format (available tags: $counter, $today, $total)
Counter_String_DefaultFormat.tooltip: The default text if no custom format is given for a counter

Counter_String_AccessError.label: Access error
Counter_String_AccessError.tooltip: The text shown when there was an error while accessing the counters
